resources: Pets/Animals Pets // Data kucing Angora Turkey Originated in Ankara, Turkey. It has a very distinct characteristics of long and smooth fur Bengali England This breed is a result of cross breeding between Asian Leopard and domestic cat in England Birman Burma/Myanmar The Birman is a long-haired, colour-pointed cat distinguished by a silky coat, deep blue eyes, and contrasting white "gloves" on each paw. Persian Iran The Persian cat is a long-haired breed of cat characterized by its round face and short muzzle. It is also known as the "Persian Longhair" in English-speaking countries. Siamese Thailand The Siamese cat is one of the first distinctly recognized breeds of Asian cat. Derived from the Wichianmat landrace, one of several varieties of cat native to Thailand, the original Siamese became one of the most popular breeds in Europe and North America in the 19th century. Siberian Russia The Siberian is a centuries-old landrace of domestic cat in Russia and recently developed as a formal breed with standards promulgated the world over since the late 1980s. Siberians vary from medium to medium-large in size. // Data anjing Bulldog England The Bulldog, also known as the English Bulldog or British Bulldog, is a medium-sized dog breed. It is a muscular, hefty dog with a wrinkled face and a distinctive pushed-in nose. The Kennel Club, the American Kennel Club, and the United Kennel Club oversee breeding records. Husky Alaska,Siberia,Finland (snowy region) A husky is a sled dog used in the polar regions. One can differentiate huskies from other dog types by their fast pulling-style. Modern racing huskies (also known as Alaskan huskies) represent an ever-changing crossbreed of the fastest dogs (the Alaskan Malamute, by contrast, pulled heavier loads at a slower speed). Kintamani Indonesia The Kintamani or the Kintamani-Bali Dog is a dog native to the Indonesian island of Bali and originated from the Kintamani region. It is a popular pet for the Balinese and locally Bali\'s only official breed. Samoyed Russia The Samoyed is a breed of medium-sized herding dogs with thick, white, double-layer coats. They are a spitz-type dog which takes its name from the Samoyedic peoples of Siberia. Shepherd Germany The German Shepherd is a breed of medium to large-sized working dog that originated in Germany. Shiba Japan The Shiba Inu is a breed of hunting dog from Japan. A small-to-medium breed, it is the smallest of the six original and distinct spitz breeds of dog native to Japan. A small, alert, and agile dog that copes very well with mountainous terrain and hiking trails, the Shiba Inu was originally bred for hunting. // Data Ikan Betta fish are small fish with a size of about 2.5 cm and can grow up to 12.5 cm. Cupang Indonesia Guppies are fish that are easy to adapt to a variety of environments. This is what makes guppy fish can be widespread throughout the world. Guppy Amerika Utara This type of ornamental fish is very popular among aquarium ornamental fish lovers. However, usually people keep these koi fish in ponds. Koi Jepang Goldfish is a type of ornamental fish that is popular among ornamental fish lovers. This fish has the characteristics of a distended belly and a bright and beautiful color that makes many people like it. Mas Koki Jepang Molly Jepang Molly fish are often also called balloon fish because most molly fish have a distended stomach and a round body. Meksiko Platy Platy fish have a small body shape and have many types. Its small size and peace-loving nature, make many people choose this fish to be an option to be kept in an aquarium. // Buat Layout Tap on picture to open gallery List of Breeds Back Cat Dog Fish List of Cat Breeds List of Dog Breeds List of Fish Breeds
